items.content_html: PixelPeek is a lightweight and powerful Chrome extension that allows you to inspect the pixel dimensions of various elements on any webpage. Whether you're a web developer, designer, or simply curious, PixelPeek provides a quick and intuitive way to get real-time pixel sizes of images, videos, icons, buttons, and more.
